sense.def:
A challenge
je nekaj novega in težavnega in zahteva veliko napora in odločnosti.

seg.quote: Mount Everest presented a challenge to Hillary.

sense.def:
A challenge to something
je dvom o resničnosti, vrednosti ali zanesljivosti nečesa.

seg.quote: There will inevitably be challenges to the existing order.
These ideas are open to challenge.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
challenges someone
, ga povabi, naj se z njim bojuje ali tekmuje.

seg.quote: They had challenged and beaten the best teams in the world.

sense.def:
To challenge ideas or people
pomeni dvomiti o resničnosti, vrednosti ali zanesljivosti zamisli ali ljudi.

seg.quote: The idea has never been challenged.
He challenged the minister to produce evidence.
